name: Cold War Trivia
description:
Test your knowledge of Cold War facts and historical leaders Ronald Reagan and Mikhail Gorbachev in this fast-paced trivia game. 

Cold War Trivia was originally going to be used for marketing purposes for Reagan Gorbachev, our action-stealth game which was released on Xbox and Steam. We never ended up using this game for any sort of marketing or PR, but it was fun to make and someone might get a kick out of it.

GAMEPLAY
Answer trivia questions about Ronald Reagan and Mikhail Gorbachev. When presented with a question, click on either Reagan or Gorbachev to choose your answer.

CONTROLS
click/tap Reagan: choose REAGAN as answer
click/tap Gorbachev: choose GORBACHEV as answer
